response.original_title: Goodbye Holland: The Destruction of Dutch Jewry
response.overview: Shocking film, uncovering the painful truth about indifference to, and collaboration with the Nazis in WWII, when 75 percent of the Jews in the Netherlands were annihilated. This investigation into the dark past explains why Anne Frank and 100,000 other Dutch Jews were deported by Dutch officials. Why did the Dutch people allow 78% of the Jews to be deported?
response.title: Goodbye Holland: The Destruction of Dutch Jewry
